title: How do I create a playlist?
answer:
![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45338) 

 1.         Touch **Music** > **Playlist** > **Create new playlist**. 

 2.         Input the name of the playlist you want to create and touch **Save**. 

 3.         Touch **OK** in the **Add songs to playlist** window. Select your songs to add and touch **ADD**.
